participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and curious, Alex loves engaging with others and exploring new interests.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing recreational games like cards, darts or billiards. I like to try different beers from various countries. I work in marketing for a large company. I like to work on cars. My favorite music genre is classic rock.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, Jordan has a strong passion for design and enjoys helping others bring their visions to life.
participant_2.background: I am chubby. I work as an interior designer. My favorite band is insane clown posse. I am tall and blonde.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
Really? That's cool! What's your favorite style?
I like modern and minimalist design.
I like that too! I'm not very good at designing, but I love looking at pictures of beautiful homes.
I can definitely help you with that! I'm a professional interior designer, so I can give you some tips and tricks.
That would be great! I'm always looking for ways to improve my home.
Okay, I'm happy to help. What's your budget?
I'm not sure yet. I just wanted to see what you could do with my space.
Okay, well I can definitely help you with that. Let's start by talking about your style and what you're looking for.
Sure. I like the look of modern and minimalist design, but I also want it to be cozy and inviting.
I can definitely do that. I'll start by getting some inspiration for you.
You're welcome! I'll be in touch soon.
